message: Starting creation of migration scripts - examining current data structures
Found discrepancy: 44 tasks in JSON, only 5 in SQLite. Creating migration scripts now
Created migration script, now creating verification script
Created both scripts. Testing migration script now

Successfully created and tested migration scripts. migrate_to_sqlite.py handles full data migration with workspace reconciliation and archived status fallback. verify_migration.py validates data integrity. Both scripts tested and working - migrated 45 tasks with 223 agents. Added comprehensive README documentation.
